title: Logitech G502 MB4 and MB5 not working in game on Mac
body: I've had a logitech g402 mouse where the side buttons work perfectly in the game, but when I got the next version of the mouse, they are not registered in the game. Anyone have any idea how to solve this issue? I know a temporary fix is to reassign to something like N and M and use that, but I click around my map with the side button since I have Attack Move mapped the Left Click so this is a bit tricky.

replies.body:
This issue might be specific to your mouse, double check any third party apps that may be tied to configuring it.  A config reset in-game could also help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.  

If that doesn't help, are you on Windows 10 and recently had it updated?
Setting do sync properly, the issue is I cannot even rebind MB4 and MB5 to anything only in LoL. I am on a Mac, not windows

Those specific mouse keys have had some issues with binding in League recently.  For Macs, you may need to locate an app that will allow those buttons to match a binding on your keyboard, instead of adjusting them in-game.  Feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can find some options for you.
